segments.text: I just got a telegram from Margaret and Greg .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are they coming to Chicago again ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . They ’ re coming the beginning of August .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , good ! We can all get together again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m glad they ’ re coming in August . Maybe Greg and I can play some golf or get tickets to a baseball game .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And Margaret and I can take the dog and go jogging in the park .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Remember the garden party they gave when we were in England ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . We all sat on the grass , and Margaret played the guitar and sang Greek songs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had a great time . It ’ ll be good to see them again .
segments.speaker: S1
